description: Removal of existing glazed link between City Gate House (39-45 Finsbury Square) and No. 50 Finsbury Square; demolition of the roof infill at second floor level; demolition of existing glazed wall and party wall line at ground floor and first floor levels; creation of a new paved external terrace at lower ground floor level; construction of a new masonry party wall; creation of new lightwell; a series of other minor removals and alterations to building elements; reinstatement of elevations to 50 Finsbury Square; and other associated and ancillary works.
decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
